relations.target: excite: stir the feelings, emotions, or peace of; 'These stories shook the community'; 'the civil war shook the country' <i30552>
delight: take delight in; 'he delights in his granddaughter' <i27573>
geek: a person with an unusual or odd personality <i89680>

senses.definition: to be especially excited about something relatively unpopular
